title: Meet the trucks-and-bulldozers companies getting rich from the AI boom
description: In the AI boom, generators are cash cows — and companies like Caterpillar and Cummins are getting rich from this unsexy but crucial equipment.
content: For the last century, Caterpillar's calling card has been its trademark macaroni-yellow backhoes and bulldozers. Increasingly, customers are interested in something else: the generators powering the … [+6636 chars]
